Title: Requires free access to medication abortion services to all students on college and university campuses
Summary: Requires that all student health centers on college and university campuses in the state offer medication abortion services and any additional techniques or processes that are associated with medication abortion onsite to students attending such colleges and universities free of charge.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring free access to medication abortion services to all students on college and university campuses
